PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-04552025-03-23FIN
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectCanada Development Investment Corporation -- Canada Enterprise Emergency Funding Corporation
PrecisOrder directing the Canada Enterprise Emergency Funding Corporation (CEEFC) to administer a new credit support facility for large Canadian companies affected by tariffs, in accordance with terms and conditions approved by the Minister of Finance.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order directing the Canada Enterprise Emergency Funding Corporation (CEEFC) to administer a new credit support facility for large Canadian companies affected by tariffs, in accordance with terms and conditions approved by the Minister of Finance.
